Reviews.Title: I love this camera and accessory bundle
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: It's too bad that we can't post some of the photos taken with this camera, because their clarity and depth are great.  I love this camera, and I'm looking forward to the great photos that I'll take this year.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha A3000 Digital Camera with 18-55mm Lens (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 55-210mm Lens + <3> Sony 32GB SDHC Class 10 Card +
<4> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <5> PD Mini Sling Backpack + <6> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod +
<7> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <8> PD 49mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <9> 49mm UV Filter +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha A3000 Digital Camera & 18-55mm Lens with 55-210mm Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + 3 Filters + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
